title: Every exit doorway shall open into an enclosed stairway, a horizontal exit or a corridor or passagew
clause_text: Every exit doorway shall open into an enclosed stairway, a horizontal exit or a corridor or passageway providing continuous and protected means of egress;

source_pdf.text_snippet: Every exit doorway shall open into an enclosed stairway, a horizontal exit or a corridor or passageway providing continuous and protected means of egress;
